5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
6. Click on the first notification entry
7. Reply to the program step thread
8. Verify reply functionality works correctly

Name: test_CMS_11_12_0_Close_Comments_View
Description:
Test Case 212: Verify ability to close comments view.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Check for unread notifications
5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
6. Click on the first notification entry
7. Close the comments view using Escape key
8. Verify comments view is closed successfully

Name: test_CMS_11_9_0_Access_Comment_From_Notification
Description:
Test Case 209: Verify ability to access comment from notification.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Check for unread notifications
5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
6. Click on the first notification entry
7. Verify user is redirected to Comments view
8. Verify comment view access is successful

Name: test_NAF_8_7_0_Upload_Video_With_Unpublished_Status
Description:
Test that an admin user can upload a new video to the platform with unpublished status.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Verify video is uploaded with unpublished status
6. Verify video appears in the videos list

Name: test_NAF_4_8_0_comment_under_enrolled_program
Description:
Test Case: NAF-110
    As a user I should be able to check programs details
    Scenario: Comment under enrolled program
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to the Programs tab
    3. Click on a program card
    4. If not enrolled, enroll first
    5. Click Day 1 video
    6. Click comments entry
    7. Click write a comment
    8. Enter comment and send
    9. Verify comment is posted

Name: test_NAF_8_10_0_Delete_Video
Description:
Test that an admin user can delete a video using the 3 dots menu.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Delete the video using 3 dots menu
6. Verify video is successfully deleted

Name: test_NAF_9_2_0_View_Programs_List
Description:
Test that an admin user can view all programs list.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Verify programs list is displayed
5. Verify all programs are accessible

Name: test_NAF_2_3_0_successful_password_reset_request
Description:
Test Case: NAF-16
    As a user I want to reset my password if I forget it
    Scenario: Successful Password Reset Request
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, Go to the Login page
    2. Click the 'forgot password?' link
    3. Enter a valid registered email
    4. Click 'Submit' button
